reference.title: Right-click menu entities column
reference.shortdesc: You can edit entities by right-clicking on an entity in the entities panel on the left side of the editor.

p.lines: Edit Entity allows you to edit the qualifying information of an entity. This will bring up a pop-up where you can change the settings.
Remove Entity allows you to remove an entity, this will also remove the text that is tagged.
Copy Entity allows you to copy an entity and identifying information. to paste the entity, place your cursor in the text in the editor and right-click (choose to paste the entity).
